Metadata.title: Bridges of Hope Association for Development and Rehabilitation
Metadata.description: A non-profit humanitarian organization registered in Turkey and Palestine, serving communities affected by disasters, wars, and poverty through education, healthcare, relief, and rehabilitation.

mission.title: Mission
mission.text: We are committed to serving humanity everywhere, without any racial, religious, or ideological discrimination, through education, healthcare services, and social inclusion, in a way that strengthens human dignity and achieves sustainable development.

objectives.title: Objectives
items: To create an appropriate environment for people with disabilities through educational, rehabilitative, healthcare, and social programs, projects, and approved technologies.
To support marginalized and most vulnerable groups and integrate them into society.
To build strategic partnerships with local and international organizations to achieve sustainable development.

vision.title: Vision
vision.text: To become a solid bridge of hope and a globally leading institution in relief work, development, and rehabilitation, through innovative initiatives and effective partnerships that contribute to building a cohesive society based on justice, health, and knowledge.

targetGroups.title: Target Groups
items: Patients and people with physical or intellectual disabilities.
Individuals affected by wars, disasters, and famines.
Underprivileged families and those who have lost their primary provider.

AboutSection.subtitle: About Us
AboutSection.title: Who We Are
AboutSection.descriptionLead: We are the <highlight>Bridges of Hope Association</highlight> for Development and Rehabilitation, a non-profit humanitarian organization officially registered and licensed in Turkey and Palestine, and a pioneer in voluntary work as well as educational, health, and developmental services.
AboutSection.descriptionBody: We strive to serve, develop, and rehabilitate individuals in areas affected by disasters, wars, conflicts, and poverty-stricken countries, adhering to principles of honesty, responsibility, and justice. We also seek to build bridges of solidarity and giving, aiming to empower individuals and elevate their lives, guided by our slogan:
AboutSection.quote: With humanity wherever it may be… dignity preserved and lives rebuilt.

values.description: Social justice and respect for human rights.

values.title: Cooperation
values.description: Cooperation and networking to achieve mutual benefit.

AreasOfWorkSection.label: Our Areas of Work
AreasOfWorkSection.title:
Our Areas of

Work
AreasOfWorkSection.summary: We provide an integrated system of humanitarian and developmental services based on the belief that the human being is an indivisible whole, and that dignity can only be preserved through the integration of education, rehabilitation, healthcare, relief, and social inclusion. Our programs are designed to respond to urgent needs and create sustainable impact.

cta.title: Want to support these initiatives?
cta.description: Every contribution helps us expand our reach to those who need it most.

pillars.title: Rehabilitation & Capacity Building
pillars.description: We believe rehabilitation is the bridge from disability to self-reliance, and from isolation to inclusion. Therefore, we focus on building individuals psychologically, behaviorally, and skillfully.

pillars.title: Healthcare & Medical Services
pillars.description: We consider health as the foundation of a dignified life. We aim to relieve pain and protect individuals from health deterioration in fragile environments.

pillars.title: Inclusive Education
pillars.description: We view education as a right and a gateway to empowerment, not merely a service. Through education, we seek to protect generations from ignorance and marginalization and build a more just and humane future.
services: Education for People with Special Needs

pillars.title: Humanitarian Response
pillars.description: We remain present where crises intensify, because relief is not merely food parcels, but a humanitarian stance that preserves life and protects dignity.
